text: Martina Weymouth (also Tina Weymouth; born November 22, 1950) is an American new wave musician. She is related to the Talking Heads and the Tom Tom Club. She is also the bassist for them. Weymouth was born in Coronado, California. ==References== Category:Musicians from California Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:New wave singers
title: Tina Weymouth
